mahajanaya mangin polisiyata samajaye waradi akatayuthukam, nithi wirodhi jawaram athulu sama deyak pilibandawama thorathuru labadena ekama margaya bawata path kere.atham polis niladharin mahajanayata pahath aakarayen karana salakim sampurnayenma polis sewayen iwath kirimata piyawara ganna bawada amathyansha lekamwaraya kiya.thawada polis sewawa kisima awasthawaka balapamwalata yatath nowi awanka ruju apakshapathi sewawak kirimata polis niladhariyata pasubima athi kirimata katayuthu kerena athara polis sewawata kala nohakkak natha yana thaththwayata path kere.rupiyal biliyana – 9kin polis puhunu akadamiyak labadi gini awiyata pamanak huruwu polis sewawa mahajana sewawata puhunu kere.thawada nawa lekamwaraya yuda hamudawe hitapu niladhariyaku wuwath kisima aakarayakin polis sewawa hamudakaranayakata lak nokarana bawada mejar jenaral nanda mallawaaarachchi mahatha kiya.amathyanshaye wada aarambha kala awasthawata polispathi en. ke. ilangakon mahatha pumukha polis departhamenthuwe jyeshta niladharin rasakda, jathika aarakshawa pilibanda madhya madhyasthanaye adhyaksha janaral lakshman hulugalla saha aarakshaka amathyanshaye niladharin gananawak da sahabhagi wuha.
